name: planted.burger
description: The ultimate comfort food with a golden, extra-crispy coating and juicy texture.
longDescription: Experience the ultimate comfort food with our planted.burger Crispy. Featuring a golden, extra-crispy coating and incredibly juicy, chicken-like texture inside, it delivers that satisfying crunch and flavor in every bite. Build your dream burger with all your favorite toppings.
ingredients: Water, pea protein, wheat flour, breadcrumbs, rapeseed oil, pea fiber, natural flavoring, spices, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry for 4-5 minutes on each side until golden and crispy. Also works great in the oven at 200Â°C for 15-18 minutes.
